templateOptions.label: Correlate only
templateOptions.description: When toggled, this connector will only correlate to an existing account and skip all further account lifecycle actions.

templateOptions.label: Only set email authentication method 'email' when empty
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the phone authentication method 'email' will only be updated when currently empty and will not overwrite existing data.

templateOptions.label: Delete email authentication method 'email' when revoking the entitlement
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the phone authentication method 'email' will be deleted when revoking the entitlement.
